remarks: ` 1r ` is unaffected by restriction.  This is a bit more generic than ~ subrg1 (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Sep-2018.)
statement:
ress1r.s $e |- S = ( R |`s A ) $.
ress1r.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
ress1r.1 $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
ress1r $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ .1. e. A /\ A C_ B ) -> .1. = ( 1r ` S ) ) $.
